title: Users on r/soyboys feel the need to threaten beating me and making fun of my gender. "What's cure for such disorders? Beatings." (+32 upvotes) "That kid gets beaten up a lot." (+26 upvotes) "Being ‘nonbinary’ has to be the most pretentious, narcissistic thing ever." (+92 upvotes)

author: krazysh0t
text:
>Yep.  You can literally do/change nothing and they have to take your  claims at face value, lest they face accusations of some form of bigotry  themselves.  I have no idea why you would intentionally cultivate a  society of people walking on egg shells around each other, terrified  that the slightest slip of the tongue could ruin you.

This is literally not true. And because of stupid people who believe this, it is remarkably easy to spot the bad actors trying to stir up trouble.

author: OwnCauliflower
text: That’s kind of a fucked up thing to say

author: krazysh0t
text: How so? Being non-binary is more than just randomly declaring you are non-binary. You have to live it.

author: Bardfinn
text: There will be no identity gatekeeping in this subreddit.

author: OwnCauliflower
text:
>it is remarkably easy to spot the bad actors trying to stir up trouble.

Go ahead and tell me how you “spot” the nonbinary-identified people who are fakes, please

author: krazysh0t
text:
The same way I identify a TERF pretending to be a trans woman. Listen to them speak. The implication of what I said is that the people who pretend don't fully understand what being non-binary is. They see a silly identity you can just claim yourself into when it is really an umbrella of genders. It's just easy to spot a fake. I don't know how else I can explain it without an example, but I don't have one off hand. Sorry.

Also, I think I should point out that I am not advocating that transtrending is a thing with this post. I'm specifically talking about bad actors trying to subvert non-binary people.

author: OwnCauliflower
text: And you’re literally saying that if we don’t outwardly perform our genders adequately to your satisfaction, you’re going to assume that we’re “bad actors trying to subvert nonbinary people”. Screw you.

author: Bardfinn
text:
This comment chain is an example of how **_NOT_** to carry out discourse in this subreddit.

[Every rule of AHS](https://old.reddit.com/r/AgainstHateSubreddits/about/rules/) requires, in some way, our participants to participate in [Good Faith](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Good_faith).

Instigating infighting, reducing others to labels, and gatekeeping identities are not actions in good faith.

These are toxic and destructive behaviours.
